about.headline: Strategy Before Aesthetics. Clarity Before Creativity.
about.body:
I'm Bethwel Monny, a brand strategist who helps leaders build brands that don't just look good—they make sense.

At MonnyCreaX, I don't start with logos or colors. I start with the hard questions: Who are you? What do you stand for? Why should anyone care?

Because beautiful design without strategic foundation is just decoration. And your brand deserves more than that.

hero.headline: I'm Bethwel Monny
hero.subheadline: Brand Strategist. Creative Director. Clarity Builder.

story.headline: The Story Behind MonnyCreaX
story.body:
MonnyCreaX began with a simple realization: most brands don't fail because they lack creativity. They fail because they lack clarity.

I've spent years working with founders, speakers, ministry leaders, and entrepreneurs—all brilliant people with powerful ideas. But too many of them were invisible, not because they weren't talented, but because they couldn't articulate who they were or why anyone should care.

That's what I fix.

I'm not here to make your brand "pretty." I'm here to make it make sense. To help you define your positioning, clarify your messaging, and build strategic direction so you can grow with confidence—not confusion.
story.philosophy:
I believe African creativity doesn't need to imitate the West. We have our own voice, our own stories, our own strategic intelligence. My work is about translating that authenticity into brands that command respect globally.

Strategy first. Design second. Purpose always.

approach.headline: How I Work
approach.body: I don't start with aesthetics. I start with questions.
questions: What do you want them to feel?
approach.conclusion: Most designers skip these. I don't. Because without strategic clarity, even the most beautiful brand is just decoration.

steps.title: Initial Contact
steps.description: You DM "CLARITY" on Instagram, email me, or fill out the contact form. I respond within 4 hours.

steps.description: We dive deep into your story, vision, and what makes you unique. I ask hard questions. You get honest about where you are.

steps.title: Hour 3: Direction

steps.description: We build your 60-day roadmap, prioritize quick wins, and ensure you leave with confidence and clarity.

steps.title: Ongoing

meta.title: Frequently Asked Questions | MonnyCreaX
meta.description: Common questions about brand strategy services, process, pricing, and working with MonnyCreaX.

questions.question: What makes you different from other brand designers?
questions.answer: I'm not a brand designer—I'm a brand strategist. I don't start with logos or colors. I start with clarity: Who are you? What do you stand for? Who are you speaking to? Design comes after strategy, not before.

questions.question: Do you work with clients outside Kenya?
questions.answer: Yes. All sessions are virtual, and I work with clients across Africa and globally.

questions.question: How soon can we start?
questions.answer: Typically within 1-2 weeks of payment, depending on current availability. I limit intensives to 4 per month to maintain quality.

questions.question: Do you offer payment plans?
questions.answer: For intensives, full payment is required upfront. For retainers, we can discuss monthly billing.

questions.question: What's included in the Brand Clarity Intensive?
questions.answer: A 3-4 hour strategy session, comprehensive Brand Clarity Blueprint (PDF), 60-day implementation roadmap, and a 1-hour follow-up call. Full details on the Services page.

questions.question: What if I need design work after the intensive?
questions.answer: Strategy and design are separate. After your intensive, I can recommend excellent designers for execution, or we can discuss design as a separate project.

questions.question: Can I bring team members to the session?
questions.answer: Yes, up to 2 additional stakeholders can join at no extra cost. More than that, there's a small additional fee.

questions.question: What if I'm not satisfied?
questions.answer: If you show up prepared, engage honestly, and we still don't deliver value, I'll refund 50%. This has never happened.

questions.question: Do you do logo design?
questions.answer: Not as my primary service. I focus on strategy and direction. If you need logo design after we clarify your brand, I can recommend talented designers or discuss it as an add-on.

questions.question: How long does the intensive take?
questions.answer: The session itself is 3-4 hours. From booking to final delivery (including follow-up call), plan for 2-3 weeks total.

questions.question: What do I need to prepare?
questions.answer: Just complete the intake form honestly and show up ready to think deeply about your brand. I handle all the strategic prep.

questions.question: Can we split the session into multiple days?
questions.answer: Yes, if needed. Some clients prefer 2x 2-hour sessions instead of one 4-hour session.

questions.question: Why are your prices higher than typical designers?
questions.answer: Because I'm not selling design hours—I'm selling strategic transformation. Thinking is more valuable than execution. You're investing in clarity that compounds for years.

questions.question: Do you offer discounts?
questions.answer: I occasionally offer early-bird pricing or package deals, but I don't discount my core services. Quality work requires proper investment.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: M-Pesa, bank transfer, PayPal, and Wise for international clients.
